thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Tasha

author: Tasha
title: Tasha
text: This site was recommended to me by a friend who knows I'm always looking for great deals on books. And I'm absolutely thrilled. They have an amazing selection, with fantastic deals, I received my books on time, (or sometimes early!), and the condition was always exactly as described or better. I'll be using this site to help me complete my dream library. I definitely recommend them to any bookworm looking for an awesome deal!
